title: T206 OLD MILL Cobb Red Portrait SGC 60
author: mechanicalman

posts.post_title: T206 OLD MILL Cobb Red Portrait SGC 60
posts.post_content:
SOLD.  is a T206 OLD MILL Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 60. Currently the highest graded in the SGC pop, but there are higher ones in the PSA pop (FYI). 

Pro's: Incredibly bold red color, great focus on Cobb, white borders, clean back and corners that look better (IMO) than a traditional SGC 60. 

Con's: A little off center right to left and the faintest hint of wet transfer on the right side. My scanner runs hot, so attaching phone pics as well. 

SOLD $4200 Delivered. Currently not seeking lower offers. Prefer check or money order (not PP as I don't plan on buying anything soon.) 

Thanks for looking. PM or email [url]samuelswartz@yahoo.com[/url]

Positive transactions with: jantz, kell75, MR RAREBACK, griffon512
Thank you for the comments, Pete and Jake!
